con:request.name: 2.RetrievePNR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:RetrievePNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:RetrievePnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode><rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>1D</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode></rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <rad1:ActionType>GetReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${#[ConnectPointRegressionTestCases#CP_43 CP_ModifyBooking 1ADT1CHD1 INF Fare bundle#CreatePNR-save]#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Response'; //ns1:CreatePNRResponse[1]/ns1:CreatePNRResult[1]/a:ConfirmationNumber[1]}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> </tem:RetrievePnrRequest> </tem:RetrievePNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 3.CancelPNR
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:CancelPNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:CancelPnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode><rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>1D</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode></rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress xsi:nil="true" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"/> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>web</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:ActionType>CancelReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${2.RetrievePNR#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Response'; //ns1:RetrievePNRResponse[1]/ns1:RetrievePNRResult[1]/a:ConfirmationNumber[1]}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> <!--Optional:--> <rad1:IsFlightDisruptionCancel>false</rad1:IsFlightDisruptionCancel> </tem:CancelPnrRequest> </tem:CancelPNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: 4.CreatePNR-save
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:rad="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Request" xmlns:rad1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Request"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:CreatePNR> <!--Optional:--> <tem:CreatePnrRequest> <rad:SecurityGUID>${#TestSuite#securityToken}</rad:SecurityGUID> <rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <rad:CarrierCode> <rad:AccessibleCarrierCode>TS</rad:AccessibleCarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCode> </rad:CarrierCodes> <!--Optional:--> <rad:ClientIPAddress>?</rad:ClientIPAddress> <!--Optional:--> <rad:HistoricUserName>?</rad:HistoricUserName> <rad1:ActionType>SaveReservation</rad1:ActionType> <rad1:ReservationInfo> <rad:SeriesNumber>299</rad:SeriesNumber> <rad:ConfirmationNumber>${2.RetrievePNR#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Radixx.ConnectPoint.Reservation.Response'; //ns1:RetrievePNRResponse[1]/ns1:RetrievePNRResult[1]/a:ConfirmationNumber[1]}</rad:ConfirmationNumber> </rad1:ReservationInfo> </tem:CreatePnrRequest> </tem:CreatePNR> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
